question: Arrange the words given below in a meaningful sequence. 1. Word 2. Paragraph 3. Sentence 4. Letters 5. Phrase
Arrange the words given below in a meaningful sequence. 1. Police 2. Punishment 3. Crime 4. Judge 5. Judgement
Arrange the words given below in a meaningful sequence. 1. Protect 2. Pressure 3. Relief 4. Rain 5. Flood
Arrange the words given below in a meaningful sequence. 1. Presentation 2. Recommendation 3. Arrival 4. Discussion 5. Introduction
Identify the sentence with the correct grammatical structure:
options: If I had known this yesterday I will have helped him.
If I had known this yesterday I would have helped him.
If I had known this yesterday I will help him.
If I had known this yesterday I would help him.
answer: If I had known this yesterday I would have helped him.

question: I could not put up in a hotel because the boarding and lodging charges were exorbitant. Identify the part with the error.
options: I could not put up in a hotel
because the boarding and lodging charges
answer: I could not put up at a hotel
